statements: DELETE FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE user_id = 12345 AND device_id = 'b28a0d4d-3c20-4a0f-b2ec-0a3adf7ff5b0';

DELETE FROM UserSettings WHERE user_id = 100 AND setting_name = 'theme';
